question: Match the following:
columnB: Unable to produce children inspite of unprotected sexual co-habitation
Physical, congenital, diseases, drugs, immunological or even psychological
Often blamed in India for the couple being childless
More often than not, in the male partner

answer.Infertile: Unable to produce children inspite of unprotected sexual co-habitation
answer.Reasons for infertility: Physical, congenital, diseases, drugs, immunological or even psychological
answer.Female is blamed: Often blamed in India for the couple being childless
answer.Problem lies: More often than not, in the male partner

question: Match the following:
columnB: Specialised health care units for diagnosis and corrective treatment

answer.Infertility clinics: Specialised health care units for diagnosis and corrective treatment

question: Match the following:
columnA: Zygote or early embryos with upto 8 blastomeres

question: Match the following:
columnB: Fusion of gametes within the female

answer.Embryos formed by in-vivo fertilisation: Fusion of gametes within the female

question: Match the following:
columnB: Artificial introduction of semen collected from husband or healthy donor
Available only in very few centres in the country
One of the best methods for couples looking for parenthood

answer.AI technique: Artificial introduction of semen collected from husband or healthy donor
answer.Facilities for ART: Available only in very few centres in the country
answer.Legal adoption: One of the best methods for couples looking for parenthood
